privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
We take privacy seriously at Rieger Systems. This privacy policy explains how we collect and process personal data on this website in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

1. Data Controller

Rieger Systems e.U.
Owner: Tobias Rieger
Musterstraße 1
6020 Innsbruck, Austria
Email: kontakt@rieger-systems.eu

2. Access Data & Hosting

When visiting our website, the following data is automatically collected:

  • IP address
  • Date and time of request
  • Browser type and version
  • Operating system
  • Referrer URL (if applicable)

This data is processed to ensure the secure and stable operation of the website. Hosting is provided by Hetzner Online GmbH (Germany).

3. Contact

If you contact us via email or form, your data will be processed to handle your request. Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b and f GDPR.

4. Analytics

We do not use cookies or third-party tracking. Optionally, Plausible Analytics (self-hosted) may be used to anonymously evaluate website traffic - no cookies, no personal data.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access (Art. 15 GDPR)
  • Rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
  • Erasure (Art. 17 GDPR)
  • Restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
  • Objection (Art. 21 GDPR)
  • Data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)

You can lodge a complaint with the Austrian Data Protection Authority.

6. Data Retention

Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for the purposes specified or as required by law.

7. Security

Our website is secured with SSL encryption. All systems are protected with modern security measures such as firewalls and access control.

Last updated: April 2025

amaracall.title: AmaraCall
amaracall.lead: The AI that answers the phone when you can't.
amaracall.desc: AmaraCall is a privacy-friendly AI call assistant, available as SaaS or on-premise, that handles incoming calls, understands requests, and structures information for your workflow - no matter the industry.
amaracall.description:
AmaraCall is an AI-powered call assistant that automatically answers incoming calls, identifies the caller's intent, and structures the captured information - whether it's a callback request, appointment inquiry, or general message.

The system is designed to run locally or as a SaaS solution - secure, privacy-friendly, and adaptable to any professional context: from clinics and IT providers to studios, offices, or workshops.

All data can be processed fully under your control or via secure European infrastructure. AmaraCall fits seamlessly into existing workflows and doesn't aim to replace humans - it supports when no one is available.

status.title: Current Status
status.text:
AmaraCall was originally conceptualized in collaboration with an IT telephony company. However, the partner unexpectedly withdrew before the first prototype could be developed.

The system design is complete. The architecture is modular and built for SaaS delivery, with optional local deployment. The project is currently on hold.

We're now looking for new partners or pilot clients - from any industry - who are ready to bring AmaraCall to life.

amaracall.ctaText: AmaraCall is built to become a trustworthy, flexible SaaS service. If you'd like to help shape or pilot the system, we'd love to hear from you.
